example.text: Officials at our border told me they need technology and staffing resources to meet a difficult set of challenges. What they don’t need is House Republicans’ push to cut 2,400 officers from border patrol. [[url]]

The Bipartisan Safer Communities Act provided $750 million for states to implement red flag laws. During #NationalPoliceWeek, I asked local law enforcement how these lifesaving measures help keep our communities and police officers safe. [[url]]

I voted to pass the bipartisan TRANQ Research Act this week because I believe we need to confront our drug crisis head-on. Now let’s pass my END FENTANYL Act to help stop the flow of fentanyl into our country.
Mr. Speaker, my colleagues across the aisle are shamelessly trying to make this into a veterans' issue. It is an NRA bill plain and simple, and they are just trying to put lipstick on a pig.

I joined the [[user]] to discuss how we can make women's voices heard in the peace process and security sector. It's simple: Without more women at the table making decisions, our world will not be fully secure. [[url]]

Today I joined the Hellenic Leadership Conference to share how I’ve worked in Congress, from [[user]] to [[user]], to strengthen the special bond between the US and Greece and uplift the boundless spirit of the Hellenic community. [[url]]

Most fentanyl that comes into the United States comes through legal points of entry. The GOP’s radical border bill would tie up resources at exactly those points, hurting our ability to stop the flow of fentanyl into our country. [[url]]
